Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to enhance your daily experience and productivity. With its unique features and high-quality materials, it's designed to meet your specific needs. I believe you'll find immense value in it. Considering its exceptional craftsmanship and functionality, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $75. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your lifestyle with our top-tier product! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
